comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "George Cave, 1st Viscount Cave GCMG, KC, PC (23 February 1856 – 29 March 1928) was a British lawyer and Conservative politician. He was Home Secretary under David Lloyd George from 1916 to 1919 and served as Lord Chancellor of Great Britain from 1922 to 1924 and again from 1924 to 1928." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Cave,_1st_Viscount_Cave
